Transaction Petition

	
	
Leaps

	
		* create the TP from fields.
		
			* prodution line:
				TP Fields
				TP AO
				TP Bytes
				
				TP Hexadecimal String
				
				UTP Bytes
				UTP AO
				UTP Hexadecimal String

				
			* verify
				TP Hexadecimal String == UTP Hexadecimal String
			
				amount is equal
				
				object has fields
			
		* create the TP from hexadecimal string.
			
			* prodution line:
				TP Hexadecimal String
				
				UTP Bytes
				UTP AO
				UTP Hexadecimal String
			
	Glossary:
	
		AO: Aptos Object
		
		TP: Transaction Petition
